sentences.en: ...a special protein which triggers the animal to shed its fleece.
sentences.cn: …一种能够促使这种动物脱毛的特殊蛋白质。

sentences.en: A sheep's fleece is clipped off for wool.
sentences.cn: 绵羊的毛被剪下做成羊毛.

sentences.en: Fake Fur Fabric, Sherpa Fabric, Plush Fabric, Velour, Velvet, Polar Fleece Fabrics.
sentences.cn: 采购产品假毛皮织物, 夏尔巴织物, 长毛绒织物, 丝绒, 天鹅绒, 摇粒绒面料.

sentences.en: Golden Fleece doesn't give the right amount of - % energy cost cost.
sentences.cn: 金羊毛不给予正确的金额 -% 的能源成本费用.

sentences.en: He was wearing black combat trousers and a hooded fleece.
sentences.cn: 他穿着黑色作战裤和带风帽的羊毛衣。

sentences.en: Improves the performance of any fabric, fleece or synthetic insulation.
sentences.cn: 可以改善各种织物 、 抓毛绒或合成绝缘材料的性能.

sentences.en: Mary Had a Little Lamb Its fleece was white as snow.
sentences.cn: 玛丽有只小羊羔,羊毛像雪那样白.

sentences.en: Michelle will also spin a customer's wool fleece to specification at a cost of $2.25 an ounce.
sentences.cn: 米歇尔也会按顾客的要求为其纺羊毛呢，每盎司收费2.25美元。

sentences.en: My warmest coat is lined with fleece.
sentences.cn: 我那件最暖的大衣衬有绒毛里子.

sentences.en: She claims he fleeced her out of thousands of dollars.
sentences.cn: 她声称他诈骗了她几千美元。

sentences.en: The bar running the harbor is waiting to fleece the tourist.
sentences.cn: 港区附近的酒吧正等着狠宰一下游客.

sentences.en: The finest fleece comes from Merino breed of sheep.
sentences.cn: 最好的羊绒产自美利奴羊.

sentences.en: The fleece from a Merino can weigh up to 12 kilogrammes.
sentences.cn: 1头美利奴羊的绒毛产量可达12公斤.

sentences.en: The wool of the fleece trapped the tiny pieces of metal.
sentences.cn: 成片的羊毛缠住了小金属片.

sentences.en: Tridimension printing types, including fleece printing and foaming printing is very famous.
sentences.cn: 不平背印花有各类典范榜样, 其洋起绒印花和不收泡印花很驰名.

sentences.en: With their fleece sopping wet, they huddled in hollows, too dispirited to graze.
sentences.cn: 在皮毛打湿的情况下, 他们挤在低洼处,靠近黑莓丛,或者躲在背风坡上, 毫无觅食的情绪.

words.tran_cn: 覆盖羊毛的；羊毛状的；羊毛似的；轻软的

phrases.tran_cn: 金羊毛（希腊神话中出现的一件宝物）

trans.tran_cn: 羊毛，一只羊一次剪下的毛，羊毛状织物，绒头织物
trans.tran_en: the woolly coat of a sheep, especially the wool and skin of a sheep when it has been made into a piece of clothing
If you fleece someone, you get a lot of money from them by tricking them or charging them too much

trans.tran_cn: 诈取，剪羊毛，（羊毛般）盖满
